## Description {#details}

A maximal outlining region.

This contains all blocks post-dominated by a sink block, the sink block itself, and all blocks dominated by the sink. If sink-predecessors and sink-successors cannot be extracted in one region, the static constructor returns a list of suitable extraction regions.

Definition at line 463 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp">HotColdSplitting.cpp</a>.

## Private Member Attributes

### Blocks {#ace6ae890f4e7aa267464886f5fbce68d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;BlockTy, 0&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;HotColdSplitting.cpp&#125;::OutliningRegion::Blocks = &#123;&#125;</>}>
A list of (block, score) pairs.

A block&#39;s score is non-zero iff it&#39;s a viable sub-region entry point. Blocks with higher scores are better entry points (i.e. they are more distant ancestors of the sink block).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp/#l00467">467</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp">HotColdSplitting.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### SuggestedEntryPoint {#adc123ad80418ee9c05ce41828f5a9af2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>BasicBlock&#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;HotColdSplitting.cpp&#125;::OutliningRegion::SuggestedEntryPoint = nullptr</>}>
The suggested entry point into the region.

If the region has multiple entry points, all blocks within the region may not be reachable from this entry point.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp/#l00472">472</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp">HotColdSplitting.cpp</a>.
